episodes.name: A Stone’s Throw
episodes.overview: A grieving man, a music exec, a father in crisis, a conflicted woman — and a pebble that causes a ripple effect connecting the lives of four strangers.

episodes.name: Drip, Drip, Drip
episodes.overview: John confides in Kris while Aria spends time with her mother. Walter struggles with technology around the house, and Nate leans on Claire for support.

episodes.name: The Twenty
episodes.overview: A flyaway dollar bill leads Kris toward an old music client. Walter and Tara enjoy an afternoon at Nate's bar. Aria shares exciting news with John.

episodes.name: The Storm
episodes.overview: Kris returns home, reflecting on where she first fell in love with music. Walter decides to pick up basketball again and gets a warm reception.

episodes.name: The Flyer
episodes.overview: After a personal tragedy, Aria receives a comforting visit from Kris. An exhausted Nate rallies to celebrate his birthday with familiar faces.

episodes.name: The White Coat
episodes.overview: A new career opportunity forces Aria to decide between pursuing aspirations and loyalty. Walter struggles to take up Brenda's charity legacy.

episodes.name: The Gift
episodes.overview: Walter checks in on Kris as she settles into her new apartment. Nate's friends and family rush to his side after an incident at the bar.

episodes.name: The Bonus
episodes.overview: As the festive season gets underway, the bar's regulars reflect on their journeys and the strings of fate that drew them all together.
